website_summaries.verdict: Compact but powerful, this portable unit jump-starts 4- and 6-cylinder engines without trouble.
pros: Very compact, small enough to store in a glove box or large center console
Multiple adapters for charging other devices
Good for multiple car starts before recharging is needed
cons: On/off switch does not apply to jumper cables, which are live as soon as they are attached

customer_reviews.title: Stopped powering on.... (Updated 2018)
customer_reviews.text: Had the item for a couple days.... tested it twice. I check it every morning to make sure it has enough juice.... and for some reason this morning it doesn't turn on.... i figured with such good reviews I would have been ok.... might have been the needle in the haystack. Please Resolve or I can just return it.... -Update 8.1.2018 Company rep. reached out and sent a replacement because of the bad experience. This new unit works great!!!
customer_reviews.author: R.S.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money and time
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this unit but I can't. It can't start a lawnmower, much less a truck or car. Save your money and buy something, anything else. And I have followed the listed operating instructions. This thing is junk - try to use it for a single start on something small and it seems to fault, it won't respond to any buttons until you plug in the charger and then it shows 99% charged. Junk! You'd be better off lighting your money on fire than buying this.
customer_reviews.author: IAmTheWalrus

customer_reviews.title: Modern car batteries don't give advance notice they're  dying
customer_reviews.text: A friend had a dead SUV battery. I applied the cables to the battery, switched the device to "on", and when she hit the start button it started immediately. Worked like a charm and the charger still showed 100% charged. My experience has been that modern car batteries do NOT get the 7 or 8 years of use they did a decade ago and most importantly, modern batteries DON'T give a warning before they die . Years past, a weak battery would struggle to start the engine but would get it going. Now it seems there's no warning, just a car that won't start. Having a car jumper battery handy is more important than ever.
customer_reviews.author: mike malachowski

customer_reviews.title: Awedome product!!! Works as described.
customer_reviews.text: Made a mistake as most negative reviewers are probably doing. Aside from turning it on and selecting the voltage (start up for cell phone charge, 4 cyl./6 cyl./ or 8cyl.), there's a small button where the clamps connect to the charger must be depressed until the LED turns solid green (this is crucial) before attempting to crank the vehicle otherwise it will not work. Starts vehicles on the first try, when I first used it I thought I had wasted my money. Now I've purchased six of these one for each vehicle in my family.
customer_reviews.author: Capt. JAG

customer_reviews.title: Extra insurance against a drained battery. A great gift for family or good friend!
customer_reviews.text: My wife, son and I have AAA. Our new vehicle has road-side assistance. Personally though, it's quicker and more efficient if you can take care of a battery that has been drained because of leaving lights on. And, if you encounter someone that needs a jump, how great it would be to provide help. Small, efficient, fits in it's carry-case in the storage compartment between the seats with a good flashlight. Would also fit in glove-box. Would make a great gift to a family member or good friend.
customer_reviews.author: STF

customer_reviews.title: One heck of a first impression.
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box, it came 95% charged, which was great because I was able to start playing with all the features instead of waiting around for it to charge. The build quality on this device is flat-out amazing. Super rugged. The surprising thing is that not only is the device itself well-made, but the accessories it comes with are also fantastic in quality -- seriously. The carrying case is rugged and is shell-styled, so it doesn't flop around and potentially damage the contents. This went straight into the trunk of my car and I feel much better knowing I'll be prepared if I ever need it. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: BuyerOfStuff

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Received quickly, and packaged well. Charged it to 100% in reasonable amount of time. My 70 Chevelle with a built high performance small block engine has been sitting with the battery so low would not even click when key was turned. I hooked the jumper cables that comes with the device to the correct terminals. Then I go into the car and turned the key and the engine turned over like the battery had a full charge in the middle of the summer. I checked the power left after disconnecting the cables, and it is still showing 100% charge. Wish I had one of these years ago, great product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Spkezy

customer_reviews.title: Must disconnect unit between attempts to start the engine.
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality and reliable jumper system at a reasonable price online. I found the directions lacking in not describing how my unit required me to exit the vehicle after each failed restart attempt and detach and reattach the jumper cable clamp. That is likely an engineering update to preserve the unit from idiots that don't read the instructions and/or individuals that don't want to wait the 30 seconds between restart attempts. Must say, knowing humans, adding the disconnect from battery step IMHO is good engineering. Highly recommend this product along with all of the extra stuff with it that enables restarting a range of products.
customer_reviews.author: BOB

customer_reviews.title: This is a lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: I got this PCJS (portable car jump starter) I noticed that it was heavy and a bit bulky. However the case it comes in makes storing it and all the accessories easy. I wouldn't want to have to carry it around, but it is a lifesaver when your battery (both phone and car) dies on you. I fully charged it in February and it still was able to start my car in December. I hadn't given it a thought for well over 8 months. I strongly suggest anyone who drives gets one of these. Even if you have road side assistance, being able to start your car when alone is a blessing.
customer_reviews.author: AkaAngela

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 2 and a half years ago and I believe I used it once or twice around then, and have kept it in my glovebox ever since. I think I've remembered to pull it out and charge it roughly every 6 months with the last time probably in December. I was in a parking lot with my kids today and the car wouldn't start. Pulled it out, hooked it up, car started right up and off we went. Plugged it in when we got home and 3 hours later it's back at 100% and back in the glovebox.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: User Manual information limited
customer_reviews.text: The jump starter had a 4% charge when I received it. The information in the User Manual is basic. I watched some You Tube videos to learn more about the device and how it works. The clamp cables could be a little longer. The "BLACK" clamp cable is approximately 4 1/2 inches long and the "RED" clamp cable is approximately 8 inches long. The kit does not come with a Apple/Mac lightning cable. The semi-hard protective case is well built but could be a little larger; to hold extra cables, small flashlight. Seems like a good product, and should serve my needs, just not satisfied with the guidance in the user manual.
customer_reviews.author: bk

customer_reviews.title: First one didn't last long, but replaced under warranty
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these over a year go and only used it a couple of times until it stopped working - would not take a charge. I was pretty impressed when DBPower reached out to me to send me a new one free of charge as a replacement (after over a year). I hope this one lasts longer. Very nice to have and works great. Company is great to work with as well.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long but replaced free
customer_reviews.text: Edit 9-4-17: Seller Nova Tech saw review and sent a replacement ASAP, no questions asked. We'll see if it lasts. Nova Tech gets 5 stars for their customer service. Worked well to jump my two mowers and a motorcycle. After two and a half months it no longer holds a charge. So, for the money I could have bought two mower batteries. Not recommended. Spend a little more a buy a bigger, real jump battery.
customer_reviews.author: mark twain augustine

customer_reviews.title: BEST ITEM ANYONE WHO DRIVES ALONE SHOULD OWN
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of purchasing those big chargers that are the size of a car battery for backup & most died after a year of use. I found this compact charger on Amazon, read the reviews & bought it. Very compact it fits in glovebox. I started a Subaru wagon that had been sitting idle for almost 2 yrs. I've helped start a couple of neighbors cars too plus charged my phone & tablet. Says it's good for a thousand starts. So glad I found this item I have piece of mind knowing I won't be stuck anyplace with a dead battery.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: 2 years in, still working great
customer_reviews.text: I've had mine for 2 years, and it still holds a charge and starts dead cars right up. I tend to use it every few months, and recharge it after. I don't think I've ever seen it lower than 70%. It has no problems with my 4.2L gas engine. The accessory case is too thick to fit in my spare tire area, unlike a smaller one I used to have, but I'll accept the minor convenience hit for how reliable this one has been. The smart cables are a big plus. You get everything hooked up, hit the button, and you get 30 seconds to start the engine before it automatically turns back off to prevent damage to the pack.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Very useful battery jump starter
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a portable car jump starter in the event my car battery died in the middle of nowhere. I did an online search for best car jumper in 2019 and this product appeared in the top 2 of 2 'best of 2019' lists. This charger is easy to carry in the car and bring out when needed. It also has USB charger ports if you need to charge your phone and you car doesn't have USB ports. I haven't had to use it yet but it looks and feels solid. If it works as well as it looks in the handy case it'll be great.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: DOUBLE PURPOSE: Jumper & Powerbank. I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one here at Amazon before christmas. I have already used it twice and everything worked great. It comes with a hard case and several accessories including an indoor 110V charger and a 12V car charger to charge this unit. This is very useful for me because I love camping. The two USB outputs is a plus, as a POWERBANK. I also ordered a few more but the smaller version as christmas presence (DBPOWER 300A Peak 8000mAh Portable Car Jump Starter ). The small is really much smaller size just like the size of a cell phone power bank. It is charged via micro USB. The DBPOWER 300A is great for 4cylinder engines.
customer_reviews.author: Spyro

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good...
customer_reviews.text: I've owned it since Aug. 2017 and used it to jump-start a few times... It worked well. No problems. I'm impressed how long it holds a charge. After many months in a bag inside my truck, I pulled it out to check the state of charge and it was still 100%. I used it today with a keep alive memory saving device (DLC OBDII Accessory) in order to keep the car's memory alive for radio presets, ECU drive cycle monitors and other modules while I changed the under hood main battery... I used the aux. power output port, 5.5mmx2.1mm DC barrel connector (user selectable 5v, 12v, 16v, 19v.) All went well. Everything seemed happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mushy

customer_reviews.title: So useful and easy to use!  Sure came in handy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this back around Christmas time. Mainly for emergencies, I charged it up and put it in my trunk (basically forgetting about it). Today, due to shelter-in-place, my wife tried to start her car after about a month. Dead battery. So I took this unit out and looked at the charge (still 76%) after 5 months! :) Hooked it right up, and the car started perfectly. Great unit. Easy to use, and sure does hold a charge. Perfect for emergencies!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser3

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so cool it definitely has got me out of a few jams extremely portable I was able to jump a few cars in a row off of a single charge I highly recommend this product if you want something very portable and easy to store if you are going off roading or if you were going on the boat This product is an absolute must if you turn the engine off but you’re simply running off of your battery there’s a chance that your battery will die out this thing is perfect and you can just whip this thing out and jump your vehicle right up and it will immediately begin to work
customer_reviews.author: Jay Wag

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Update: Contacted by the customer service department due to my initial 2-Star rating (see below comments) and they reminded me of the warranty and sent me a replacement with little to no fuss. This is an example of what companies need to do to keep customers and stand behind their products. For that initiative and professionalism the product deserves a 5-Star rating. Purchased the DBPOWER 600A to have a readily available jump starter for the various vehicles I own. I used the device maybe 10 to 12 times and it worked perfectly. Then one day (within 2 months of purchase) it simply had no juice and would not reload when plugged into the wall outlet.
customer_reviews.author: R. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Great service from retailer replacing defective device
customer_reviews.text: LCD display showing charge percentage and mode use was defective/unreadable, contacted retailer, and after sending them a photo of the display and purchase receipt, I received a replacement unit, minimum muss and fuss if you can verify your claim of defective product. Renzy was my online facilitator on behalf of dbpower helping me with my claim (completed online) great service on her part staying connected, processing the equipment and receipt photo without dropping our connection, job well done on her part.
customer_reviews.author: Ahuacatl

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work for 5.9l v8. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This thing did NOT work. It says that it should be able to jump a car up to even a 6.0l v8. I had my car die several times from a parasitic draw. It would NOT jump the car no matter how many times I tried. Haven’t been able to get it to jump anything else either. The flashlight and charging ports are great. That’s why it gets 1 Star. But it’s way too big to be a charging block. Wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still working strong after one and half years
customer_reviews.text: We had a dead car battery in November 2016. I bought this jump starter for future use on amazon based on its great reviews. I used it a few times to charge my cell phones on the go. I followed the instruction and recharged the jump starter every a few months. After a while, I forgot about it until I had another dead battery in June 2018. I realized I hadn't recharged it for at least half a year. I was surprised to see it still held 100% when I took it out. It worked great and I think should write this good review.
customer_reviews.author: fy8h

customer_reviews.title: Worked as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I had literally unpackaged and read the directions so I could use this as part of my winter preparedness kit- I had not even checked to see if there was a charge on the device when a friend called to say we needed to change plan as he was waiting for roadside service to jump off his car’s battery. I rushed over and the DBPowerb worked immediately . There was no delay in his workday this device was perfect. I have one in both cars now. Thanks PKP from De.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: A Great, Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for awhile now. Finally had the chance to write a review on it. Both fortunate and unfortunately, I haven't had the opportunity to jump my own car. I have however jumped someone else's car. Worked great. Not just for cars but can charge other devices. I have been checking on the power status weekly based on others' review how the charge won't hold up well. It wasn't the case for me. For me personally, a single charge lasted couple months before it went down to 50% power. Whether you end up using it or not, its definitely a must have especially if you travel a lot. Comes with a semi-hard shell case.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Pak

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Due to the current COVID-19 shelter in place order my car battery drained. I didn't have jumper cables and after reading reviews of products on amazon I decided to try this product. It was easy to use and started my car quickly and easily. It seems very sturdy with good quality materials for the charging unit and cables. The hard case is a nice touch. I'm very impressed with this product and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Don't drive on the beach without it
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this item after a scary experience we had on our beach vacation last year having drained our Forester battery just as the tide was coming in at sunset, only to be saved by a friendly fisherman and his cables. The item arrived at a very opportune timing: our Honda civic hybrid''s battery just died on us today. The portable jump starter came 95% pre-charged, so we just followed the simple instructions and the car jumped back to life as if on a new battery . As we're getting ready for this year's vacation, we are very happy that it passed the real life test so we now feel much safer having it with us.
customer_reviews.author: Global Citizen

customer_reviews.title: Nice package and appears to be very well built
customer_reviews.text: Nice package and appears to be very well built. Charged it to 100% upon receipt, and has used it twice within two weeks in this cold weather (CR-V). Each time engine started at first attempt. Battery indicator still shows 100%. Bought this to replace my old Lead-acid jump starter that didn't fair well when temp drops below 20F. Only complain is the case compartment is bit tight for cables and other accessories, takes some wiggling to put things back. IMO those laptop adapters are useless.
customer_reviews.author: X. Cao

customer_reviews.title: Lithium Safety Net
customer_reviews.text: It's about time these got cheaper. I had one at my auto shop ten years ago that costed almost $500 and was smaller CCA than this. I have one in my car, and I used the connector to make jump leads for my motorcycle with a second that's in my biker bag. Lithium means it will hold a full charge for a very long time which is a good thing since nobody will remember to check its charge very often heh. Human nature, right? But every car should come equipped with one of these as part of the road side tire tools and safety package.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Fulkerson

customer_reviews.title: SBPOWER 600A Jump start packing.
customer_reviews.text: Well finally got a chance to use it. Co-worker had a dead battery, not even a clicking sound when turning the key. Connected the DBpower, started mini van first turn of the key. charger was sitting about 2 months before use, still showed 100% after jumpstart. Co-worker was gone by the time I got the starter back in the bag. My only negative is that cables and connectors do not fit too easily in the bag but charger is well protected.
customer_reviews.author: Donny from RI

customer_reviews.title: Don't Leave Home Without It
customer_reviews.text: No need to worry when you can't get your car started, this jump starter will get the job done. This jump starter is easy to use, light in weight and perfect in an emergency. Don't leave home without it., You really don't want to wait for the Automobile Club or ask a stranger for a jump start, especially if you are alone and in an unknown area. Reasonably priced and it will give you peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and Compact Jump Starter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit because I had been using the old "plug into wall" type units, that really didn't do a good job and required the battery to be hooked up for tens or minutes to h ours and it was not portable. After doing research on Amazon and reading reviews, I settled on this unit. Right from the box I liked it, it was all-in-one, and very compact. I can leave it in one of the storage compartments of my car so it can be used on my car or anyone else's. If you're in the market for a compact well designed jump starter, you should buy one of these!
customer_reviews.author: SkyPilot

customer_reviews.title: Every emergency kit should have one
customer_reviews.text: I have successfully used this wonderful magic gadget 6 times for my car and my neighbor's. After our most recent subzero cold snap, with cars sitting unused for well over a week, this powerhouse started them first try. Cars that were completely unresponsive, not even a click when the key was turned, fired up right away. Six emergency stars and it's still at 94% even sitting in the frozen car between uses. It's small, and very handy. I think I'd be very glad to have this in an extended power outage to charge up my cell phone or other devices.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Tonella

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one because I had previously purchased another one from DBPower and I had never had to use it but it kept a charge pretty good. I ordered this one for another vehicle and never knew I would have to use it the very next day. Talk about providence. I received the charger 2 days after ordering it, charged it as soon as I received it and took it with me the next day. My battery would not crank, pulled it out and followed the directions. It worked like a charm and it still had 97% charge. I am glad I purchased this. It is a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: swolesworth

customer_reviews.title: Way better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I have bought of 3 these and am very impressed with them. I have used them to start everything from a 4 cylinder turbo to a high performance 48 valve V12 without issue. today my Cummins diesel pickup that had been sitting several months had a dead battery so I decided to give it a try, not really expecting it to start but to my amazement it did start it. the jump pack drained much faster than with any of the gas engines but at least it started. I ordered another one to keep in my airplane.
customer_reviews.author: Bush Pilot

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind on our road trip
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I have been on a cross-country road trip in our van for nearly 2 years, and sometimes we find ourselves in very remote areas. Our vehicle is on the older side, and we've had times where one of us accidentally left a light on, and our battery would drain. So, to be on the safe side, we decided to get this device, so that we could jump our engine just in case there was no chance we could get a jump from someone else's car. It has brought me a lot of peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Burns

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Helper!
customer_reviews.text: This Portable battery really helped out. My battery was drained because I left the lights on overnight and in the morning this little guy just started my diesel truck without any hassle. Just plug and start. It is a 3.0L diesel car with a 95AH battery in it. Really handy also if your going on roadtrips, fits in the glovebox and comes in a nice hard case. Highly reccommended!!
customer_reviews.author: BluRx8

customer_reviews.title: On first charge right now, seems like solid product
customer_reviews.text: None yet, have it only a few hours, so it's being charged. Solid product, seems very well designed, everything works. Not fair to do any kind of evaluation beyond that. I have a 2015 Honda Fit that has killed two batteries in the five years I've had it, for no reason other than I don't drive enough to keep the battery alive, so rather than call AAA again and again, I decided to research highly rated jump starters, this was one of the top rated. So far, pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for keeping in the car and ready to go!
customer_reviews.text: I drive a classic car and attend several car shows each summer. Last year a car next to mine had a dead battery at the end of the show and no one was able to help because he didn't have jumper cables. That's when I decided to get a portable car jump starter pack. I saw yours advertised and decided to buy before this year's shows. I'm glad I did because I was able to help another car this week when his battery ran down during the show. It worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Paul C Scharping

customer_reviews.title: Looks great -- instruction manual lacking
customer_reviews.text: I've only just received it and like the looks and feel; its quality seems to live up to the positive reviews I read that made me want to purchase. I would, however, recommend including with the unit how to turn on I've only just received it and like its looks and feel; it seems to live up to the positive reviews I read that made me want to purchased. I would, however, recommend including with the unit how to turn on the flashlight and red warning light, as well as how long it takes for the initial charge, for which I had to use Chat and YouTube. But, so far, so good! Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Blair

customer_reviews.title: Used batteries..
customer_reviews.text: Very nice products, the only bad thing novatech send and sold used batteries.. pretty disappointed I emailed them and no one responds so they don't give a s*** about customer..
customer_reviews.author: fernando mendez

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: I finally got to try this out. I received this 2 months ago and charged it, and it's been in my trunk since. A friend left his trucks lights on and his battery was as dead as they come, not even a click to be heard. This little bugger tuned over that 8 cylinder, 350 engine no problem. When I got home I figured I'd plug it in to top off the charge and was very surprised to see that after 2 months in the trunk and jumping that truck, it was still at 100% charge. We will see how it works during a Northern Minnesota winter.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: Had to Figure it Out But Now Good
customer_reviews.text: Tried twice to jump cars and wouldn't work. Later found out you have to push a button on the cable plugs??? No where in the instructions does it mention that. Since then I successfully jumped 2 full size trucks. Everything else works great. Love how compact it is. I can fit on my motorcycle and take on the boat. Will probably buy more for the kid's cars. UPDATE: Bought my brother one for his birthday. He jumped 2 cars within days of getting it. He couldn't believe it
customer_reviews.author: ShakaBrah

customer_reviews.title: Successfully started a car right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. The unit came with 95% charge. I had a car that immediately needed a jump after sitting for over a month. The car started right up, even faster then when using jumper cables and a donor/good battery car. Instructions are easy to read. I recommend reading the quick guide before using it, as you do need to understand the meaning of the red/green light blinking pattern and the boost button. Build quality is solid and comes in a rugged case that fits my Land Rover's side compartment in the rear cargo area.
customer_reviews.author: VeloCat

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Someone told me these type of power jumpers for cars were great. I decided to purchase this one because of the reviews. Some reviews were not kind, but you have to make sure you get the right one for the size of your vehicle. Another thing is closely read the instructions. You will definitely love this is you ever need to jump up vehicle. I’ve use it twice already. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hall

customer_reviews.title: DBpower stands behind this product
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. One had a problem of the battery is saying its 56% full after storing at 100% after a few months. The other discharges at a much lower rate. I posted my experiences and DBPower reached out to me to resolve the problem I was having with the defective charger. They refunded my money so that I could replace the defective unit. THANK YOU for caring about your customers! I have used them a few times and its been able to start my car when I needed.
customer_reviews.author: TJ S.

customer_reviews.title: Peace of Mind. Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: Super compact and super powerful. It's great to have some peace of mind while camping or backpacking that if we came back to a car that was completely dead, we wouldn't have any problems at all. In addition, we use it on the boat while island camping just in case we run the stereo on the batteries for too long (whoops!) Overall, definitely worth having just for the peace of mind. I was very skeptical that it would be able to start my pickup truck with the battery completely dead, however it started like I completely replaced the battery! Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Brennen S

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! You can't really know until you need it whether it works and now I know it does! Battery was dead, put cables on, turned on, car started! After I used it I figured it would need recharging so plugged it in, nope still at 100%. It has also kept its charge being stored in my car in northern Michigan this winter. So I'm comfortable wandering into the national forest knowing that if I have a dead battery I can charge up and be on my way. Now if a tree falls across the road, that's a problem, but that's a different adventure!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, compact car starter
customer_reviews.text: When my car battery died from leaving my lights on, I needed a jump STAT. I ordered this at night and it arrived early the next morning (thanks Prime One Day). It came charged to 96%. Clear instructions and it fired right up. I like the compact size to slide right into my glove compartment. I don't need the bells and whistles like the laptop chargers, but the flashlight is bright and handy. Maybe the USB ports could come in handy too if your phone and car battery are dead. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t Work
customer_reviews.text: *Update on 11-10-18* The company that makes this contacted me on their own to make sure I was satisfied & sent me a replacement! Great customer support! I’ve had the product for a year & it worked the first couple of times. But when I pulled it out to jump start my car, it wouldn’t turn on. I’ve charged it for a long time & it still won’t turn on. It will only turn on with it plugged into the charger & it says 100% charged on the display. When I unplug it, it turns off.
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah

customer_reviews.title: Battery swelled up.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased one for myself and one for my son. The units worked great until just over three years old. Both swelled up. Contacted the vendor and they said do not use as might explode. As units were just over the 3 year warranty period, only offered a slight discount on a new one. We live in Phoenix AZ, and I was always concerned with the lithium battery and high heat. So, not sure if I want another potential bomb in my vehicle. I do not think it is a brand problem, but rather a problem with any of these type devices.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small but Mighty!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jumpstarter and I'm really impressed! I was surprised that such a small thing could be so powerful! It can start my car multiple times on one charge. Also, it has many features, like charging USB devices (2 at a time), charging many kinds of laptops, flashlight and red signal light. I love how it's such a good quality product for a low price.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy Y.

customer_reviews.title: Works great and holds it's charge for a really long time.
customer_reviews.text: We started having dead battery problems and this charger works great for starting the car! Once you charge it, it holds it's charge really well. It's still at 100% charged after using it several times. And the company sent a free gift too - a digital tire pressure gauge. So very happy with this purchase. The only downside is their website. It was down when I went to register for my warranty, but contacting their customer support was great. They responded right away and registered for me. The website was up eventually so I applied for the free gift. Again, nothing happened with that, but when I contacted customer support again they sent it to me right away.
customer_reviews.author: mh

customer_reviews.title: Compact, Replaces Jumper Cables and a Second Car!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet because I bought it as a precaution for the next time I have a dead battery. Based on that, I would say that the packaging is very nice. I'm amazed that such a small package can replace a set of jumper cables and flagging down another car to assist. In the meantime, my kids can use it to charge tablets in the backseat.
customer_reviews.author: mattgreenbean

customer_reviews.title: Life saving cure for a bad car battery.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little rescue kit everyone should have with their vehicle. I've used it to jump start my chevy 2500 with a v8 many times... and each time it barely seems to use any of the battery capacity to do so. (screen display usually says 100 or 98% After a jump.) This kit comes with every possible attachment you'd need. I also ordered the cigarette plug adapter for this so I can power standard 12v camping items as well as it works well as a general power source also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian AfficianatoTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME product!!  MUST HAVE!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AWESOME!! I've started several (15) completely dead vehicles (cars and trucks) without needing a recharge. I don't understand how this thing is so powerful! As soon as you connect the jumper, it's ready to start the car. No wait time at all. I had an issue with the on/off switch starting to mess up, the company replaced it VERY quick without any issues under warranty! I highly recommend this jump starter to everyone! I also purchased the newer 1200 amp version and it's awesome as well! This is a MUST HAVE for every driver!!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: GET ONE!!
customer_reviews.text: After a few dead batter episodes in my DHs 2016 subaru I grabbed this for him when it was on a deal of the day. He's used it twice already and it work perfectly to start the car. He charged it after the two uses and after sitting in his cold car in Boston for two weeks, the unit is still at 100%, ready to go. Definitely worth buying!!
customer_reviews.author: Dragonlady332

customer_reviews.title: Nice unboxing impression
customer_reviews.text: I received the product yesterday, and it made a great impression out of the box. The quality of the storage case is fantastic, and the product looks well designed and well made. I haven't had a chance to test it yet, but I charged it up and it is holding at 98% after 1 night without the AC adapter. I think they could have made the case a little bit bigger, as it wasn't easy to get all the accessories neatly back into the pocket after taking them out. But so far I like it.
customer_reviews.author: H. Chang

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as gifts for my families vehicles. Fully charged, put in vehicles. 1 month later it still showed battery power in the mid 90's % . Unit wouldn't jump a small car. The problem with these types of units is you charge them too full and don't use them for a while and find out it doesn't work the warranty period is already over. I bought 3 of these so I must now check the other 2 for function. UPDATE: The company sent a new unit.
customer_reviews.author: B Mats

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact unit. Easy to store in car. Hold charge for a long time
customer_reviews.text: Nice compact unit. Easy to store in car. Hold charge for a long time. Product description does not mention the nice handy carrying case included with the unit that hold the jumper cables and the charger. So glad to get rid of the bulky lead acid charger I had before. Seems like my old charger the battery would fail after a year or so and I would have to replace. hopefully the LiPo in the DBPower unit will be much more robust
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J. Woulfe

customer_reviews.title: What a LifeSaver
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I broke my own rule never to drive without jumper cables and my battery died. It has sat in my trunk for a few months just begging to be used. While waiting on my wife at the airport I was listening to the radio with the engine off. When she sent me a text to tell me she was ready for pick up the car was dead. Uh Oh, what now? I quickly grabbed the jump box, attached to the battery, pressed the button and VOILA, it started! Crisis averted. Best $70 I've spent in a long time
customer_reviews.author: Patti Imler

customer_reviews.title: Liked it, so bought another one.
customer_reviews.text: Just received my jump starter unit and first impression is very pleased. Comes in a nice protective case, organized with all the little accessories inside. This is the second one I’ve purchased to go in our second vehicle. As I’ve just recently received it, can’t comment on long term performance of this unit.
customer_reviews.author: DTrain

customer_reviews.title: Dead Battery  Use this product to start your car
customer_reviews.text: Works It is portable. It is rechargeable. Saved me from walking a long way Good product. Works well. Starts your car where you have a dead battery. Used this product to start my car when my battery died. Made it possible to get to the store to buy a new battery. Made it so I didn't have to walk a long ways to get help. Decided that I need one for each of my vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Dean Jex

customer_reviews.title: IT DOES NOT WORK.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a great product, but after the first time it started my truck, it has NOT WORKED SINCE. I am VERY disappointed with this product.😠😠😡😡😡🤬
customer_reviews.author: Darilynn McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little jumpstarter
customer_reviews.text: We have had to use the product several times to jump start our vehicles and it has always worked flawlessly. It also holds a charge for a long time. Just recently the display was being glitchy so I contacted the company since it was still under warranty. They asked a few simple questions to determine the issue and decided to send a replacement. You can tell they care about their products. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Bock

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never seen a product like this before. I grew up with a dad who could fix everything. My boyfriend ended up buying this for his daughter she was having battery issues. I liked it so much I bought one for myself. After I bought it I experienced several battery issues. If it was not for this device, I would’ve been stranded. Often times I’m by myself or traveling alone, this device is perfect for anyone. I highly recommend this device. It is easy to use, it maintains the charge for a very long time, it’s compact, And most importantly, it does the job. Buy this for anyone in your life that has a car. You will not be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use and works extremely well.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my first one on 29 Sept 2018 for my car. I have used it multiple times on dead college student's mazda, our Honda Odyssey, old Chevy truck and multiple times on John Deere lawn mower. It works great and is easy to use. As long as it is charged, works first time and every time. It's also nice that I can charge my iPhone if need be. Since Sept, I have purchased 2 more and now have one for all three of our cars.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: It was 97% charged. Excellent quality. Day after I received it I parked my car outside instead of garage because of a repairman at house. 8 hours later I went to put it back in the garage and the 4 month old battery was dead!!! Solar flares or EMP? Thank goodness for the DBPOWER! The first time I used it and it worked like a charm! 2013 Dodge Dart won't even shift into neutral with no battery and that was the reason for purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta

customer_reviews.title: Great product with solid support from the company
customer_reviews.text: I was able to use this to start my vehicle after the batter failed due to cold weather. Amazing little device! Also I needed some tech support in registering the warranty information and they were johnny on the spot helping me get it completed even though there were some errors. Thank you for the great service!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind!
customer_reviews.text: What a neat little device. The case is hard and won't get crushed in my saddle bag. It has jumpers and ports for USB, as well as various adaptors to charge laptops. Since it will jump start a 5.6 L. diesel, starting my 1600 CC BMW cycle should be a piece of cake. Doing short winter trips with cycle and trailer lights on, heated seat and grips, radio, GPS and dash cam, my little battery let me down more than once. No more worries.
customer_reviews.author: FireFly Flyer

customer_reviews.title: Great portable jump starter.
customer_reviews.text: It works great. It starts my 2000 Acura TL in one start in the 2017/2018 cold winter. And the battery hardly dropped from that jump. I did charge it but I believe it would have enough charge for a couple more jump starts. I have an old "transportable" car jump starter that is a few years old that has the size of basket ball. In comparison this unit is extremely portable.
customer_reviews.author: BlueOwl

customer_reviews.title: A Must-Have for Road Trips!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a good tool to have just in case. Approximately one week after buying it, I needed to jump start my car. Up until now, I've used this for my car, friend's cars, and even ATVs. I also used it to charge my phone on the road or out and about. Unfortunately I haven't been able to charge my laptop yet with it, but that's something I can live with for now.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Walker

customer_reviews.title: I give 4 starts, since has not been used. Will be updated end of summer.
customer_reviews.text: I give 4 stars, since I have not used yet, but... Arrived on time, better than described. So far as it feel, look, all functions and accessories comes with are more than I expected. Everything is in neat and good looking traveling pouch. I learned this from the towing guy who boost my car after not driving it for awhile, and this made the car started in seconds! I am crossing country this summer and I got it as an insurance.
customer_reviews.author: Applecola

customer_reviews.title: Great Car & Large Truck or SUV Charger. Quality Materials and Accessories
customer_reviews.text: Great product build, packaging and accessories. It works on large v8 5.7L truck and 6 cylinder 3.2L car. Has many other uses to charge phones and other electronic devices in an emergency or if not able to find electrical outlet. The quality of the charger and case is great!
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Previously owned a DBpower mini jumper starter, but the battery swelled up and i no longer trust it(tried starting vehicle for to long) lesson learned. So i bought this model to replace it. the mini worked amazing till the issue, to bad warranty is expired(3 years old). Better to stay with a brand i know then try something new, and that may not perform as well. Hope to get to use it soon. Just received it and and I am charging it up.
customer_reviews.author: MJG

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: First one didn't work at all. Tried it on two vehicles and it didn't do a thing. After I posted a one star review the company contacted me and sent me a replacement which worked perfectly! I used it to jump a dead car battery. Now I have piece of mind and don’t have to be worried about being stranded because of a dead battery.
customer_reviews.author: MVP

customer_reviews.title: Excels at what it was designed for
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this jump starter mainly to keep in my car in case the battery in the car dies. I have used it to jump a full sized sedan numerous times on one charge and jumped an old tractor. The light looks adequate if you need it in an emergency situation, and there are numerous other features that I have not had the need to use. The jump starter holds a charge really well and can get multiple jumps off a single charge.
customer_reviews.author: austinkirsh

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I work at a car dealership who are constantly having to jumpstart cars. The only drawback here is With a Subaru. Subaru’s when they lose power take a long time of cranking to start back up. These two small jumper pack that I purchased can’t handle it. But any other car works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Typrice

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold its charge
customer_reviews.text: This thing really doesn’t hold it’s charge well at all. I charged it to 100% before storing it away and then a month later i need to charge my phone. When i turned it on it showed 100% started to charge the phone and it dropped a percent every second all the way down to 50%. I emailed DB Power customer service but was ignored.
customer_reviews.author: An

customer_reviews.title: Starts 1.5L engine easily, holds charge
customer_reviews.text: The charge lasts for a very long time without dropping in percentage. I tested it by disconnecting the battery from my 1.5L engine, and connecting to the power bank directly. I noticed no difference between the car battery and this battery pack for starting the car. The percentage only dropped a little bit, so I just left it in my car without recharging it. I was also able to charge one laptop with the regular round DC connection, but my USB C MacBook only through the 5V USB, which doesn't charge much unless I am not actively using the laptop. It would be nice if this had an adapter that allowed the 19V charging to USB C.
customer_reviews.author: Giac

customer_reviews.title: Excellent performance, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I like its performance most. My van got battery drained out, once plugged in and connected to the battery, only 10 seconds I was able to crank up our Honda Odyssey van. And the battery drained only a bit. The two USB ports and 12/16/19V port with multiple connectors for all kinds of laptop computers are so useful It is very convenient when we have a long trip. The hard case is also a plus. The performance/price ratio is very competitive when comparing the capacity in the market. I strongly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Fire Mountain

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Machine! Really Works! My 1993 4.0 Ltr 6 cyl Jeep Cherokee had a dead battery, so I gave the DBPOWER a try , hooked it up per the instructions, turned the key on waited 4 seconds for the electric fuel pump to prime the fuel rail , turned the key to start and my Jeep started right up , Fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: R. Schmiedel

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: my first jumper had defective cables. Had to use a set from my other brand jumper. The company reached out to me and sent me a new jumper that works great out of the box. I am very happy with their service and have used the jumper multiple times to jump my v8 f150.
customer_reviews.author: Zoltan Mclovin

customer_reviews.title: Only complaint is these wires can get jumbled in the cool zipper pouch
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product. Small size and sleek design. Cranked dead battery in large V8 multiple times and still showed 97% battery. Sleeks case and numerous adapters/chargers. Only complaint is these wires can get jumbled in the cool zipper pouch, but probably should just remove what you aren’t likely to need and stow. Essential for a trunk or on a boat.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Brown

customer_reviews.title: Big help from a small car
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a jump device for my new car (to help others) and I didn't love the large size ones I was seeing. This is the perfect size to keep in my subcompact. It has every connector I could possibly need for laptops or phones, and all the power to do anything I need to do. I'm not looking forward to the emergency situation I will need this in, but I will be SO GLAD I am prepared for that emergency when it happens.
customer_reviews.author: R. Embling Sr.

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend it to anyone that travels off the highway
customer_reviews.text: I keep this in the back of my Outback at all times. It holds a 100% charge for months. I used it 3 times a few days ago to jump a Hyundai Sonata and it still had 71% charge left. Very small for what it's capable of. I would highly recommend it to anyone that travels off the highway.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product - SUPERLATIVE Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two 600A 18,000mAh units one for each of our cars. First one bailed us out at 2am on a snowy, 5F, windy night time arrival. Second one was needed to start my diesel Volvo mini excavator also mid winter. Both performed flawlessly. Perhaps even more importantly was the absolutely incredible service received from thier outstanding customer service. (Talking to you Evelyn). She, and everyone else we spoke with listened to and understood our issues and responded quickly. ("issues involved a price discrepancy between db's advertised sale price and price on Amazon). Issue was resolved in minutes - one can't ask for better than that. I'd give 6 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Prokids

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: I really like the way the DB power is package makes it easy to store under the seat of my truck. Comes with just about all you could need. My car battery was dead hooked up the DB with ease waited a few minutes and cranked it right up. Since the car was in the garage I used the built in flashlight to get set up which was a big help. So at this juncture I'm impressed will see how it fairs as time moves on. But at this point I'd say this is a pretty good and useful tool for any vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Wilderness1022

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my daughter to use in an ...
customer_reviews.text: I was immediately contacted by the seller after leaving my review and offered a new unit. The unit was shipped over night and arrived with no issues. It appears to be working fine. The issue was resolved to my satisfaction and I would order again if I needed another one I bought this for my daughter to use in an emergency in November. She had the opportunity to use it for the first time yesterday. The unit got hot, the cables melted and the box expanded in the heat. Waiting to get it back so I can take pictures and contact seller
customer_reviews.author: Grant Romney

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: It is nothing short of amazing what this little jump starter can do. It brought my Vette back to life after two years in storage. I jump a guy in his truck after several other folks with jumper cables failed. Never loses a charge! A must have for a young driver's car, your wife's car, your truck... It's great
customer_reviews.author: Nautiboy22

customer_reviews.title: Great item to have for each car!
customer_reviews.text: I have used a previous model of this product and decided to purchase another one for my second vehicle. We have also helped others whose car batteries needed to be jumped. So much easier than re-positioning cars and using jumper cables! And it works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Acustk

customer_reviews.title: Little box with a lot of juice...!! worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I have used it for jump start the cars only.. I haven't use the other fixtures that come to the unit but so far the jump start has work perfectly. Im amazed that it only takes about 5% for each jump. So that means that this baby carries enough juice to jump start cars many times before it needs to be recharged again. I love the digital display as it lets you know how many power you have left. I know a lot of people complains about the instructions dont have enough information but in my experience, the instructions were clear enough for me to get me to use it with out a problem
customer_reviews.author: hugo herrera

customer_reviews.title: Lots of power in a small package
customer_reviews.text: Got it last week and had to use it today. It worked amazingly well and started a very dead truck right away. It really surprised me how quickly the engine turned over. It's bigger than what I expected from reading the reviews and may fit in the glove box if it was empty. As others have stated, cables could be a little longer but the whole unit is still smaller than carrying jumper cables and having to find help. Overall, very happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Looks good.
customer_reviews.text: Seems well put together and functional. Haven't had to use it yet. It's replacing another similar one that failed after 18 months. The fact that this one only had a 12 month warranty concerns me. I would expect this to last longer than that and that you would support it for at least 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Demmitt

customer_reviews.title: Compact and powerful
customer_reviews.text: I have used this to boost large gas engines and small riding lawnmowers. It is easy to use and provides sufficient electrical current for the boost. I was pleasantly surprised at the number of boost per charge. I have also taken the booster camping and used it as a power source for phones, tablets, and speakers. It is compact and a permanent fixture in my vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Murray

customer_reviews.title: This battery will change your life!
customer_reviews.text: This charger is amazing!!! I just received it March 8th and I already got to use it at the grocery store! When I walked up the the gentleman, that was asking people to jump his car, with this tiny little box he was so confused... after I hooked it up and turned it on... he turned his key and his starter instantly cranked and his engine started! He was blown away and asked where I bought it! I showed him your link on amazon so hopefully you get another happy customer from this!!! AWESOME AWESOME AWESOME product!!!
customer_reviews.author: TheEastwood3

customer_reviews.title: DB Power Saves the day!
customer_reviews.text: My Wife the other day left the dome lite on by accident. And 2 days later, of course, the battery was stone dead. So I told her no worries honey ill get out my DB power supply and ill get u going in a flash. So I hooked the DB Power Supply to start it and it started right up with no problems, thanks DB Power u save the day!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Young Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Compact and powerful
customer_reviews.text: Nifty little jump starter with nice carrying case and accessories. Doubles as phone / laptop charger and flashlight which I doubt I'll ever use as I bought it as back up starter for my generator (and possibly an automobile or two). Have not needed to start a car with it but it works great on jump starting my 8000 volt 12 horsepower generator. Even after jumping it the charge stays at 100% so no doubt it should turn over a car engine as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tim C from Long Island

customer_reviews.title: Useful, compact, and versatile!
customer_reviews.text: Had been holding off on purchasing a product like this for my vehicle and decided to jump on this when it was being sold as a lighting deal. Would be a great purchase even at full price. Compact size, very nice carrying case, with various plug adapters included. Works well as a battery backup for electronic devices and also as a flashlight!
customer_reviews.author: ChristW

product_meta.title: DBPOWER 800A Peak 18000mAh Portable Car Jump Starter (up to 7.2L Gas, 5.5L Diesel Engine) Battery Booster with Smart Charging Port (Black/Yellow)
feature_bullets: POWERFUL & COMPACT: Jump start your vehicle (up to 7.2L gas or 5.5L diesel engine) up to 20 times with 800 amps of peak current and heavy duty clamps and cables. Compact enough to store in your glovebox.

SMART CHARGING PORT: With 18000mAh capacity and smart USB port, it can full charge your laptops (include 8 in 1 laptop adapters in the package), smartphones, tablets, and other devices at the fastest speed possible.
PROTECTION: The high quality and spray gold intelligent jumper clamps has over current protection, short circuit protection, overload protection, over-voltage protection, over-charge protection.
LCD SCREEN & COMPASS: The new-added LCD screen can exactly show the remaining power. The compass can help you find your way home when get lost in the wild.
WHAT YOU GET: DBPOWER Jump Starter DJS50, intelligent jumper clamps, 12V wall charger, 12V car charger, use guide, our fan-favorite 3-year Warranty and friendly customer service.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,630 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars

categories: Jump Starters, Battery Chargers & Portable Power
